TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OpenReadCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別的執行個體傳遞至方法。Instances of this class are passed to methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範下載資源，以便讀取。The following code example demonstrates downloading a resource for reading. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#30)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#30)] 下載完成時，會呼叫下列方法。The following method is called when the download completes. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#31](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#31)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#31)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#31)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Result As Stream
public: property System::IO::Stream ^ Result { System::IO::Stream ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得包含由 方法下載之資料的可讀取資料流。

span.span: Gets a readable stream that contains data downloaded by a method.
A that contains the downloaded data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您應該檢查和的屬性，才能使用這個屬性所傳回的資料。You should check the and properties before using the data that is returned by this property. 如果屬性的值是物件或屬性的值是`true`，非同步作業未正確完成和屬性的值將不再有效。If the property's value is an object or the property's value is `true`, the asynchronous operation did not complete correctly and the property's value will not be valid. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用這個屬性所傳回的資料流。The following code example uses the stream returned by this property. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#31](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#31)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#31)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#31)]
